name: Hell Hound
languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The hound has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The hound exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
